column4: what does this output from gcc mean: "Package gtk+-2.0 was not found in the pkg-config search path.

?
2006-01-09T14:35:00.000Z	Jowi	joachim-n	install libgtk2.0-dev
2006-01-09T14:37:00.000Z	Jowi	joachim-n	the package build-essential will help you there. install that one and the libgtk2.0-dev.
